analyzed: buddha ppiyena ghana buddha guṇa ppiyena

original: Yā jeti kañcana sarāvaliyā siriṃ sā,

analyzed: sovaṇṇa vaṇṇa sukhuma chavi somma kumma
tesu patiṭṭhita su komala dīgha paṇhi

original: Ye maddino viya caranti saroja sīse;
analyzed: ye maddinaḥ viya caranti saroja sīse

original: Sañcumbitā viya ca tāni parāga rāgā,
analyzed: sañcumbitā viya ca tāni parāga rāgā
te nīrajāḥ muni padā padadantu lakkhim

original: Agāmi kāla jana maṅgala bhattu bhāvaṃ,
analyzed: agāmi kāla jana maṅgala bhattu bhāvam
sādhetu naṃ pada yugam jaya maṅgalāni
sassevi jantu vara santi pura ppavese
ye te dadhanti kala maṅgala lakkhaṇāni
saññāṇakam viya yat assita sabba lokaḥ
sajjaḥ va tiṭṭhati yahim su vibhatta lokaḥ
tam sabba loka paṭibimbita dappaṇa ābham
pāda dvayam jana su sat jana hetu hotu
dhamma ssa sabba bhuvanassa ca issa ratte

original: Pāti ca pātu satataṃ janataṃ apāyā.
analyzed: pāti ca pātu satatam janatam apāyā
vāretu sabba gati vāranam aṅkusaḥ so
sammā dadātu pada nissita puṇṇa pattaḥ
pādesu jantu mana bandhana dāma bhūtam
sevī iva pāda siri nicca samubbaham va
atra api sakka bhava nubbahaṇe niyuttaḥ
cakkam dhajam ripu jayāya jayat hajāya
saṃkham paviṭṭham iva mā ārabhaya padā adhas
pādaṭṭha saṃkham iha vattatu santiyā vaḥ
pāda ambuja ākara vigāhi tu na upahontu
sattā āpagāḥ jana manaḥ ja male jahantu

original: Selā ca satta vidadhantu janassa tānaṃ,
analyzed: selā ca satta vidadhantu janassa tānam
dāhet tanesu jahatam pada cāmaram tam

original: Yasmiṃ miginda gata bhīti balāva daḍḍha,
analyzed: yasmin miginda gata bhīti balāva daḍḍha
tam sīha vikkama padam hanata ghadantim
pāpa ahinaḥ hanatu pāda suvaṇṇa rājā
pādaṭṭha hatthi pati sampati jantu tāse
kittī iva pāda paricārika tā niyuttā
ohāya dibba sarasim khila loka sabba
jantum purindada puram nayatam vaḥ sīgham
mā avikaram va pada nissita mora rājā
tam dhamma desana ravena iva luddakassa
saṃsāra sāgara gate sa dhane jane te
na itam pade kala catummukha hema nāvā
saḥ pāda pañjara gataḥ karavīka pakkhī

original: Te cakkavāka makarā api koñca jīvaṃ,
analyzed: te cakkavāka makarāḥ api koñca jīvam
jīva ādi pakkhi visarā sarasi iva bhuttam

original: Jantu tahiṃ viya pade suramentu niccaṃ.
analyzed: jantu tahim viya pade sura mentu niccam
tam canda kinnara gatim iva gatassa bodhi
dhārentu jhāyim iha soḷasa dhātu dhāmā
hitvā gatim viya ṭhitā pada satta rūpā
sat nīra puppha mukula upamam ussavāya
niccam su sajja ṭhapitam muni tiṭṭha tante
chaddanti dinna vara danta yuga upamānā

original: Taṃ hatthi soṇḍa kama puṇṇa guṇā tavorū;
analyzed: tam hatthi soṇḍa kama puṇṇa guṇā tava ūrū
khandhā ava dentu paripuṇṇa gune janānām
cakka dvayī mana manaḥ ja hayaḥ mune te

original: Nābhī gabhīra sarasī siri keḷitā te,
analyzed: nābhī gabhīra sarasī siri keḷitā te

original: Detaṃ lahuṃ sivaphalaṃ bhajataṃ mune te.

analyzed: pantī vibhatti sahitaḥ siri keḷi sajjaḥ

original: Mettādayā kari vadhū kara sanni kāsā;

analyzed: sākhā sakhā tava bhujā bhajatam dadantu

original: Piṇetu tena sarasena sabhā jane te.

original: Dvandānu kāri miga rāja kapola līlaṃ;

original: Līlā vinaddha rucirā tava danta panti;

analyzed: vānī vadhū dharita mālati mālya tulyā

analyzed: jivhā vacī naṭa vadhū kala raṅga bhūtā

original: Kubbantu saṃgama malaṃ jana sotu kāmi.
analyzed: kubbantu saṃgama malam jana sotu kāmi
ghānā ūru cāru kadalī vadanā lavālā
bhū vallari dvaya mayūra yugassa tuyham
na id tat vayam manasi puñchatu pāpa dhūlim
indīvara anta gata bhiṅgika panti bhaṅgi
pamha āvalī siri gatā iha tiras karontu
hotam tava jja janatā mati cāra hetu
tad gāhinaḥ viya janassa dadātu vittam

original: Tiṭṭhantu sajja duritāri jayāya te bhū.

original: Sodhetu tvaṃva bhava nissita jantu metaṃ.

analyzed: tvam sabba jāti gahataḥ api nikkhamittho

original: Evaṃ janā bhava dukhā khalu nikkhamantu.

analyzed: dhārā sucittu sutale sati daṇḍa baddhe

original: Sattena kena pi yathāhi abhejja nejjo,

original: Tvaṃ sabba satta cirabhāvita metta citta,

original: Satthāsi bujjhi bhagavā si tatheva jantu.

original: Vācā vicitta vara tantu gataṅgi kaṇṭhe,

original: Loke hitāya ṭhapitā tava danta dhātu,

original: Kāruñña vārida cuto daka bindu bandhū,

Vuttena tena vidhinā vidhinā tato taṃ,

original: Accanta roga jaratā maraṇā bhi bhūtaṃ,
